TopicTitle: Pressing "m" in VAB STILL opens the map screen! Reproduction steps included.

Articles.Content: If you move directly from Flight or Map to the VAB and then eventually save a vessel, pressing the "M" key will return you to the map for that last active vessel.  You can lose your save if you are not careful, but mostly it's a PITA.  Workaround:  Go to KSC then to the VAB.

In version 0.1.2.0.22258, pressing 'm' in the VAB will occasionally open the map screen.

To reproduce, use the tracking center to select and then control a vessel. It may be that the vessel must have a functioning control center, or it may be somewhat intermittent. Not sure yet.

While controlling the vessel, press 'm' to open the map normally.

With the map open, open the burger menu and select the VAB.

While in the VAB, press 'm.' The map screen will open and display unusual behavior.
@PTTGx222 Merged your bug report with this one.
